ingredients: 1 large red apple, cored and very thinly sliced,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed,   +   1/4 cup melted butter, 1 large egg, 2 teaspoons water, 1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 71g 91%, Saturated Fat 27g 135%, Cholesterol 143mg 48%, Sodium 496mg 22%, Total Carbohydrate 96g 35%, Dietary Fiber 5g 18%, Total Sugars 38g, Protein 12g, Vitamin C 5mg 25%, Calcium 49mg 4%, Iron 4mg 21%, Potassium 229mg 5%
